name: Dental Surgery
description: Oral surgery is a broad term for any operation performed on the structure of your teeth, gums, jaw and mouth. These include tooth extraction, dental bone grafts, corrective jaw surgery .

name: Dental Implants
description: A dental implant is a prosthesis that intersects with the jawbone or skull bone to help the denture act as an artificial prosthesis or orthodontic anchor, such as a crown, bridge, denture, or facial prosthesis.

name: Dentures
description: When an adult loses a tooth, it is best to replace it with another artificial or artificial tooth in the right place, which does not mean that it is not real.

name: Periodontology
description: Periodontics is the specialty of dentistry that affects the supporting structures of teeth as well as the diseases and conditions that affect them.

name: Cosmetic Whitening
description: Teeth whitening (or bleaching) is a simple, non-invasive dental treatment used to change the color of natural tooth enamel and is an ideal way to enhance the beauty of your smile.
